Articles.Content:
okay. lets get this over with.

problem:i dont know what is a good aratio for karborundum to water for the torch drive!

end statement: help plz

If you needz halps wez needz moar detals.

End statement; Would love to help you out, but I have no clue what a torch drive is thus necessitating more details on its intended function and mission purpose.

 

Tag me with the mod that you got it from. Would suggest google.

@EndTraveler:

All of the K+ torch drives use water and karborundum at a 50 : 1 ratio.  If I'm not completely off, that's by volume, not mass, so it's a matter of having 50 units of water in a water tank for every unit of karborundum in a K+ tank as seen on the resource tab; you don't have to figure the densities or anything like that.
